title: uyirgaLukkellAm uyir
sahitya:
uyirgaLukkellAm uyir nIyE anbin uraiviDamAi engum niraindAyE


anupallavi

  payigaLukkellAm pei mazhai pOlE padam pera evarkkum nI udavuvadAlE


caraNam    kangulum pagalum tingaLum kadirum kaDum puyal tenral iDi mazhai minnal
pongum alai kaDal pUvinam tENmaDal pani malai nIr shunai pArinil paDaittanai
